posts.post_content:
I'm finally doing something I've looked forward to doing for years - I'm trying to complete my t206 set by trading my dupes to fellow collectors in return for the cards I need.

My want list that I put into excel earlier tonight was transfered from a handwritten list I wrote about 25 years ago.   So as I've mentioned before in my posts - I am in fact re-engaging with the hobby.  (that phrase is a running joke with my new bride)

I'm sorry the list couldn't be uploaded in excel - but there are 4 columns - card number, name, team, and pose.  in some cases I didn't list the team and the pose was not applicable.  I hope you can follow it.

I have not yet put the cards I have to trade in a list - but I have about 50 HOFers and 100 commons and will gladly review your want list.  Condition is mostly gd-vg with some clean vg-ex.  

I'm looking for non-graded gd-vg or better cards in return.

Hope I can help you complete your set as well as complete mine.

And no - I don't have the biggie's.  :)

this is my 3rd month on this site - and I love it.  great group.   thanks
